pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cross-platform port of Arx Fatalis, a first-person role-playing game. This package only includes the game executable - you will also need the data files from the original game.

use.flag: Enable asserts and debug logging and disable optimizations.
Build a x11-libs/qt-gui-based tool that allows to submit crash information to the upstream backtracker.
Build tools that can extract the game's data and save files.
Build everything in one big source file, allowing for faster build times and better optimizations at the cost of higher memory usage.
Install the Arx Fatalis data files. This does not change the contents of this package, it only adds a run-time dependency on games-rpg/arx-fatalis-data.
Install the Arx Fatalis demo data. This does not change the contents of this package, it only adds a run-time dependency on games-rpg/arx-fatalis-demo.
